name: In Rotation Android App
tagline: An app for live collaborative playlists between users, using the Spotify Music Library and Profile Database SDK
body:
# Welcome to In Rotation! This is the next step in the music experience. The dangerous disputes over of the operation of the aux cord... are over. With In Rotation, the music in the car or at the bumpin party you're having will be a group effort, mixing the best and most vibin music for everyone. Sorry iOS, Android gets shotgun today. Simply download the application onto your Android phone, authenticate with [Spotify](http://www.spotify.com) and start spinning what's in your rotation. ![In Rotation Logo](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano/master/pages_resources/logo/record_logo2.png) ## User Experience The interface for In Rotation is simple and straightforward, helping you get hyped a little faster. The steps are easy and demonstrated below:
![Home Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano/master/pages_resources/screenshots/HomeScreenScreenshot.png) ![New Playlist Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano/master/pages_resources/screenshots/SearchingSong.png)
![New Searched Song Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano/master/pages_resources/screenshots/SearchedSong.png) ![Active Playlist Screen](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano/master/pages_resources/screenshots/ActivePlaylist1.png) ## Overview of the System Architecture **INSERT SYSTEM ARCHITECTURE HERE** **INSERT CLASS DIAGRAMS HERE** ## Technologies Extending past the standard Android application, In Rotation was built on many current and powerful technologies. Some of them include: * Spotify [SDK](https://developer.spotify.com/technologies/spotify-android-sdk/) and [Web API](https://developer.spotify.com/web-api/) * Firebase [Real-Time Database](https://firebase.google.com/) for quick updates to active playlists and users in the system * Volley HTTP [Request Library](https://developer.android.com/training/volley/index.html) ## Design Patterns Used To achieve high performance and a foundation of understandable code, popular design patterns were used in different components of the system. They are as follows (in the current build): * Singleton Pattern for the Spotify Profile Access and Playback functionality * Abstract Factory Pattern for creating collaborative playlists * Observer Pattern for notifying the playlist view when the database updates ### Support or Contact Having trouble with In Rotation? Check out the [project repo](https://github.com/cpe305/fall2016-project-AndrewCofano) or contact support at **acofano@calpoly.edu** to give you a hand.
